title: Topic 004 Question 032
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains an Azure AI Document Intelligence resource named DI1 and a storage account named sa1. The sa1 account contains a blob container named blob1 and an Azure Files share named share1.
You plan to build a custom model named Model1 in DI1.
You create sample forms and JSON files for Model1.
You need to train Model1 and retrieve the ID of the model.
Which four actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
NOTE: More than one order of answer choices is correct. You will receive credit for any of the correct orders you select.
